author: jiafulow
body:
This PR should fix https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/21001 reported by @mrodozov .

The unit test code `TestPhiMemoryImage.cpp` does not compile with Clang (although it compiles with GCC) because of an undefined behavior related to bit shifting. This was reported in the above issue and was described in more details there. The class that is being tested by the unit test, namely `PhiMemoryImage`, is not affected.
title: Fix wrong bit shifting in TestPhiMemoryImage.cpp
